Take a Bow team! LinkedIn India Marketing and Sales Solutions team pulls of a super TechConnect in Bangalore. Thank you to all our clients who spent time with us and also allowing us to be part of your B2B marketing and sales journey! #inTC17
In the job search, every connection counts. Learn how a former student helped Claire find #TheWayIn.
Head of India and South East Asia Business Development

Responsible for alliances and partnerships for Linkedin in India. As a member of India leadership council also responsible for cross-functional strategic inputs and initiatives for Linkedin.Responsible for Linkedin growth via partnerships; user growth, engagement growth, revenue growth. As an integral part of the Linkedin global product organization responsible for working locally with startups in the talent, edtech, jobs and content space.Liasoning with Govt ministries and industry bodies like CII, Ficci and Nasscom on helping find economic opportunity for Indians in the workforce. Working with established online players in the Jobs, Classified and Content space for mutually beneficial partnerships.
Head - Mobile Product and Technology Solutions

Responsible for mobile enterprise solutions and products. Managing the technology solutions team to execute large deals and strategic projects. Developing and driving solutions in internet of things (IOT), education, mobile security, sales force automation (SFA) and other domains.Additional charge for leading display solutions on an interim basis for Samsung.Previously managed partnerships with leading system integrators like IBM, TCS, NIIT, HCL  for Samsung.

Head of India Business Unit at TES, The largest network of teachers in the world. TES  is a unique social platform for etchers to share teaching resources and class lessons with teachers across the world.As Country GM responsible for establishing and growing TSL Education business in India, scaling the teachers community and driving revenues via job listings for Teachers.

Responsible for Strategic Alliances and Partnerships for Yahoo in India across all Yahoo product lines and services.Lead the Telco/ISP, Mobile and Software/Tools Distribution partnerships for Yahoo across India and South East Asia
Managing the PreSales for Process and Quality Consulting in the Asia Pacific Geography. Profile involved extensive travel to all the countries in the region.
Member - Regional Committee on Skills and Education
Advocacy and capacity building for various initiatives in the areas of Skills and education. Focussing on skilling for a better economic future for youth in India.
Member - Regional Committee on Skills and Education
Advocacy and capacity building for various initiatives in the areas of Skills and education. Focussing on skilling for a better economic future for youth in India.

Tommaso del Re
Head of International Business Development at LinkedIn
September 13, 2013, Tommaso managed Sachin directly

I had the privilege to work with and manage Sachin during my tenure at Yahoo. I have a tremendous amount of respect for Sachin as a professional who is passionately dedicated to striving for excellence and results while at the same time being a great team leader. Sachin time over time showed innovation in defining and executing new deals in ways that created precedents and successes well regarded across all the Yahoo! glabally. What most impressed me though, and I most learned from, is his thoughtfulness in managing and leading a team. Working at Yahoo! was not free of highs and lows but Sachin was consistently able to inspire and keep loyal what I still believe was the best performing team at Yahoo! in India at the time. Given the opportunity I would not hesitate in asking Sachin to work with me.

Digital and emerging technologies leader
August 5, 2013, Sachin worked with Akshay in the same group

The most well rounded professional I've even known summarizes Sachin. His people skills are second to none -- he is able to rally support from any quarter (internal stakeholders, peers, customers, partners, etc.) to drive his vision into reality. A very grounded leader that is well respected by his peers and the industry in general. I may be biased -- but I'd recommend Sachin for any role in a heartbeat!

Revenue, Customer Success & Partnerships
August 1, 2013, Joby worked with Sachin but at different companies

It had been a great experience to work with Sachin over the last four years. He used to be one of the key contacts at Yahoo during my Aircel days and it was great to see the excitement and passion that he had to get partnerships live. His communication skills and logical explanations used to surprise us and had been very crucial in getting Aircel - Yahoo partnership live. My current stint also provided me opportunities to interact with Sachin on certain global engagements. Over years, he proved to be an impactful influencer in Yahoo eco system. His management and negotiation skills were impressive in our last engagement while @ Nimbuzz.

Rajeev Batra
CIO at Bennett Coleman and Co. Ltd. (Times Group)
July 31, 2013, Rajeev managed Sachin directly

Sachin is one of the extraordinary personnel who worked with me at Bharti Airtel.  He was a key resource in IT Strategy and Enterprise Architecture unit @ Bharti Airtel, that worked in aligning technology nuances with business imperatives.  Well networked with excellent inter-personal and communications skills, Sachin is a valuable asset in a team, he leads or belongs to.  He was one of the key members in the path-breaking Bharti-IBM multi-billion dollar strategic IT outsourcing deal.  Overall an excellent resource, self driven/motivated, has an eye for details, team player, positive attitude and zeal to make it big !

summary: Product Evangelist | Startup Mentor | Deal Maker | Angel Investor | IOT EnthusiastDemonstrated track record to seed and grow new economy business to scale. Expertise across mobile, consumer electronics, education, telecom, software services and internet business. I love to contribute back to the Indian digital ecosystem by mentoring early stage startups and entrepreneurs. Fintech, IOT, machine learning, mcommerce are keen areas of interest.Self-confessed consumer-tech and internet-of-everything (IOT) enthusiast who loves to experiment and dabble with new technologies and its potential adoption use cases. A mobile product evangelist who loves to create new solutions for day-today use cases.Partnership centric professional who has delivered business value via strategic alliances,  business development and independently managing a business unit.Helping leaders and managers grow to their potential is a passion and I believe every employee deserves a great manager. Had the pleasure to work with great people at Linkedin, Samsung,  TES, Yahoo, Satyam and Bharti Airtel.
name: Sachin Kapoor
title: Head of India and South East Asia Business Development at LinkedIn
